participation_order.text: Be here. Be present. Choose to be here. Focus. Lean in.
No electronics/devices. No distractions. No interruptions.
Exit the room if you need to take a call/text.
Take care of your needs. If you need to go, go.
Start & end on time. Stick to the agenda. Stay on point.
Defer non-agenda topics. Park issues in the parking lot.
Share all relevant information. Share your experience.
No rabbit trails. Stay out of the weeds. Keep it moving.
KISS: Keep It Simple and Straightforward.
Don’t overcomplicate it. Stay out of La La Land.
Don’t repeat what’s been said. Once and done.
Listen. Remember the ratio of ears to mouth.
Speak up! Don’t let your input/opinion go unheard.
Be brief. Share the air. Participate—don't dominate.
Engage. Every voice heard. Speak now or forever…
Non-participation not allowed. Say what’s on your mind.
Balance your participation. Balance advocacy & inquiry.

curiosity_imagination.text: Be curious. Stay open. Be creative. Be imaginative.
Every idea has possibility. Imagine the impossible.
Nothing's too crazy. Be a little weird. Embrace chaos.
Suspend judgment. Decide when it’s time to decide.
More than one right answer. No one right answer.
Don’t look back. Don’t kill the mood/vibe/mojo.
Don’t boil the ocean. Keep it high level.
Be positive. Have fun! Make it a game. Play hard!
Keep learning. Fail fast. Have a growth mindset.
Be explicit about intentions, inferences}, assumptions.

respect_inclusion.text: Demonstrate respect. Esteem everyone. All belong.
Protect the interests of those not present. Be nice. Be kind.
Listen for understanding, not judgment. Relate.
One speaker at a time. No side-bar conversations.
Don’t edit or speak for others.  Own your opinions.
Share interests or needs before stating opinions/positions.
Agree to disagree. Seek to collaborate. Push for win-win.
Vegas Rules. What's said here, stays here. Protect confidentiality.
Don't take it personally. Don’t make it personal.
Don’t assume intent or attribute motive/agenda. Reel in projections.
Build on shared values/common ground. Be tactful.

challenge_critique.text: Be real. Be candid. Be transparent. Be vulnerable.
Show up. Unpack your thinking. Excavate the unsaid.
Discuss the 'undiscussables'. No elephants in the room.
Own your stuff. Speak your truth. No-blame zone.
No carry-on baggage. Check your ego at the door.
Ask questions to understand, not to judge.
Explain your reasoning/rationale. Share your logic.
Challenge the thinking--not the person. No devil's advocates.
Critique ideas, not people. Debate ideas}, not people.
Stay objective. Don’t take/make it personal.
Not everything is a debate. Pick your battles.
Decide how to decide. Stick to the decision-making rule.
Specify next steps, date due and person responsible.
Be accountable. Each person is accountable to every other.
Once we leave the room, we are one: one voice, one mind.
